title: How do I manage (copy/back up) contacts?
answer:
**Backing up contacts to an SD card:** 


 1.         Touch **Settings** > **DEVICE** > **Storage** > **Default Storage Location**. Select the SD card. 

 2.         On the **Contacts** screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45289) > **Manage contacts** > **Export to storage** and then touch **OK**. You can open File Manager and check the VCF file in the root directory of the SD card. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45290) 


 **Recovering contacts from the SD card** 

 1.         Touch **File Manager** and **SD card**. 

 2.         Select the backup VCF file and touch **OK**. Contacts on your phone are automatically recovered from the SD card.
